title: Is Justice Coming For Hunter Biden? (Ep 1868)
description:
In this episode, I address the real reason the Hunter Biden “is going to be indicted” story leaked to the media right before the midterm elections. 

News Picks:

Twitter explodes over news federal agents have enough to file charges against president's son.


Justice Department Targets Pro-Lifers Again.

California students learned no math in two years, yet Gov. Newsom wants to be president.



Forbes goes after me for daring to ask questions about potential nuclear war.

In this episode, I address the real reason the Hunter Biden “is going to be indicted” story leaked to the media right before the midterm elections. 


News Picks:

  • Twitter explodes over news federal agents have enough to file charges against president's son.
  • Justice Department Targets Pro-Lifers Again.
  • California students learned no math in two years, yet Gov. Newsom wants to be president.
  • Forbes goes after me for daring to ask questions about potential nuclear war.
